value:
Sharena and Anna both asked me for
my "beauty secrets." My secrets
have NOTHING to do with beauty...

I served Plegia until I chose to cast
my lot with Ylisse. But you know...$k$pI was truly braided by fate with
only one person in my past.

Tired from all that walking around?
I could curse you so you can't
sleep, if you like.

Ah, er, goodness me! This weather is
benign, eh? ...Did that sound normal?
Which version of me do you like?

I like working on new hexes. So if
you talk to me at the wrong time,
you might suffer...consequences.

I would have words with you. Now,
you must be the one called
$Nu, yes?$k$pSomeone close to me has taken
an interest in you... Someone named
$Nf.

I can feel the darkness
growing ever stronger...
Hee hee hee...
Who DARED to curse me?!

Enhancing MY power? You don't
know what's good for you...

You may call me Tharja. I am a dark
mage from Plegia. Now, I shall be
your shadow...

Ah, excellent—it seems my hex
to summon you worked
immediately.$k$pYes, that's right. You came here
because of a hex—a hex that made
you want to talk to me.$k$pI sprinkled powdered lizard on this
paper, and you were drawn toward it.
...Hm? The lizard's worn off...$k$pSo you came here of your own free
will? Surprising, yet...not.$k$pHeehee... I already have someone
I'm destined to be with, but you're
just as precious to me.
えい…
そぉら…
What's the big idea...
You're already dead.
Do you like darkness?
Hahahaha!
You won't get away from me.
Curses...
Heehee...
Did you need something?
I've taken a real interest in you.
Last night you turned over 13 times in your sleep. Impressive.
I like you, but my true devotion is for a particular tactician...
I'll curse all of them. No one will survive.
I just finished it—an extra-special hex just for you.
Heehee... Too late to regret summoning me now.
Yes...
Oh. Joy.
What now?
